extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Algorithms in computer program and Pitch sequencing in baseball have a structured approach

algorithms.description: Breaking down a problem into smaller parts and using mathematical processes and patterns to guide the design and execution of a solution
algorithms.mechanism: Organizing design steps as a series of well-defined instructions for consistent outcomes and ease of replication and optimization

pitch_sequencing.description: In baseball, pitch sequencing involves strategically selecting and ordering different types of pitches to outwit batters
pitch_sequencing.mechanism: Similar to algorithms, pitch sequencing breaks down the challenge of facing a batter into smaller parts, using a structured approach to guide the selection and execution of pitches for desired outcomes
